pkgmetadata.longdescription: # empackPack a mamba environment with emsdk## Installation```bashmamba install empack -c conda-forge```or with pip:```bashpip install empack```## UsageYou can pack the environment (located at `/path/to/env`) with the following command:```bashempack pack env --env-prefix /path/to/env --outname python_data --config /path/to/config.yaml```This will generate two files `python_data.js` and `python_data.data` that you can use in the browser.A sample config is located in [`tests/empack_test_config.yaml`](https://github.com/emscripten-forge/empack/blob/main/tests/empack_test_config.yaml)
